data.title: Andy Feit, small business expert, on small business radio program, The Small Business Advocate Show
data.text:
Andy Feit

Andy Feit is Chief Executive Officer at Enlocked. With more than 25 years in the enterprise software industry, Andy joined Enlocked from security leader McAfee, where he was responsible for product marketing in the risk in compliance business unit. Andy joined McAfee when it acquired database security provider Sentrigo, where as VP marketing he led the companyâ€™s marketing strategy. Andy also served as VP of marketing or CMO at several early stage software companies, including Mark Logic, Verity, Knova and Inktomi. He was a VP and General Manager at early internet leader Infoseek until it's acquisition by Disney, and a director and principal analyst for market research firm Gartner Group.
